meanings.definition: To steer (a vehicle) too much in one direction.
meanings.sent1: The driver oversteered and almost hit the curb.
meanings.sent2: She oversteered around the sharp turn, causing the car to skid.
meanings.sent3: The cartoon character oversteered the spaceship, making it spin out of control in a funny way.
meanings.sent4: His emotions oversteered his actions, leading him to make impulsive decisions.
meanings.sent5: The student oversteered the pencil, creating a messy scribble on the paper.
